Uses of Package
org.prolog4j

Packages that use org.prolog4j
Package Description
org.prolog4j Provides the foundation classes of the Prolog4J Framework. 
org.prolog4j.jlog This package contains the JLog implementation of the Prolog4J API. 
org.prolog4j.jtrolog This package contains the jTrolog implementation of the Prolog4J API. 
org.prolog4j.swi This package contains the SWI-Prolog implementation of the Prolog4J API. 
org.prolog4j.tuprolog This package contains the tuProlog implementation of the Prolog4J API. 
 

Classes in org.prolog4j used by org.prolog4j
Class and Description
ConversionPolicy
          An instance of this class represents how terms are converted to regular Java objects (POJOs) and vice versa.
ConversionPolicy.TermPattern
           
Converter
          Converter instances can convert objects of type T to another object.
IProverFactory
          IProverFactory instances manufacture Prover instances by name.
Prover
          A Prover object represents a Prolog knowledge base, on which you can create and solve queries.
ProverFactoryBinder
          The binding of ProverFactory class with an actual instance of IProverFactory is performed using information returned by this class.
Query
          Represents a Prolog query.
Solution
          Represents the solutions of a query.
SolutionIterator
          The SolutionIterator interface servers for traversing the solutions of a Prolog query.
